duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, direct, and control the execution of construction contracts for heavy industrial (utility power plant) customers to meet schedule, cost, quality, and safety objectives for large multi-million-dollar projects.
Lead the contract negotiation with the General Contractor (and other sub-contractors) and administer the sub-contract agreements.
Coordinate schedule needs with the UCC Project Manager to ensure that construction activities align with material delivery dates.
Manage and provide direction to other UCC Field Service staff and prepare and implement site-specific Health and Safety Management Plans.

Secure future business opportunities by maintaining excellent Customer relationships and identifying improvements to UCC construction processes and workflows to improve efficiency, reduce errors, and provide a best-practice standard for future construction work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Construction Management, Project Management or Business (Master's preferred)
